alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 2:36AM MST until August 12 at 8:15AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM MST THIS MORNING FOR YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 234 AM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 2 inches of rain fell. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Camp Verde, Bignotti, Aultman, Jordan, Middle Verde, Verde Village, Bridgeport, Cornville, Cottonwood, and McGuireville. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Oak Creek, Verde River, Cienega Creek, Beaver Creek, Cherry Creek and Spring Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
